name: VR - Home On the Range
description:
Home on the Range is an VR western style shooting range inspired visually by borderlands franchise.

Get highscores to unlock items, levels, guns and cosmetics.

*This game is in very early development and is part of a student project*

Feedback would be highly appreciated and helps to improve and develop the game

You can give us feedback here:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScgzMFDridYmUALZyDoFQtrEsTkcSxiCEv75U1U...
